mapper.select: select a.userid, bmtid, gpstm, lat, lon, speed, cp, carinfo from gps_info a, ( SELECT userid, max(gpstm) as max_gpstm FROM gps_info where to_date(gpstm, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') = current_date group by userid ) b, ( select a.userid, cp, carinfo from cp_list a, ( SELECT userid, max(reg_date) as reg_date FROM cp_list group by userid ) b where a.userid = b.userid and a.reg_date = b.reg_date ) c where a.userid = b.userid and a.gpstm = b.max_gpstm and a.userid in (select userid from admin_user_list where adminid in (select adminid from admin_user_list where adminid = 'user01' or userid = 'user01')) and a.userid = c.userid order by userid
